title: Sho Sotodate
text: is a Japanese <a href="swimmer">swimmer</a>, from <a href="Abashiri">Abashiri</a>. He competed in the <a href="Swimming%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%204%20%C3%97%20200%20metre%20freestyle%20relay">4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event</a> at the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a>.
